title: Person of interest(Dead Reckoning) Kara and Greer hospital scene (Eng subs)
author: Manos Nomidis
comment: Man, if Greer monologued before he killed me, I don't know if I'd even be mad...
wwooowwwww... the episode where everything changed;  the best character - and enemy - that i could have ever asked for:  "dead reckoning" 💫

Tried to turn Kara-> Succeeded
Tried to turn Shaw->Failed
Speaks volumes about Sameen's strength of character and willpower. If Kara and Shaw ever had a faceoff , Shaw would tear Kara a new one without breaking a sweat.
Jesus, those last thirty seconds. When I first saw that, I was like... okay, that show looks fine.
description:
A dialogue taking place in Season 2 Episode 13 , where Greer ask for Kara's cooperation , giving her the right motivation .
